CustomField.description: Indicates that the Apex class implements RecordsFlags.SharedData and is used for returning data shared by other Fetcher classes. There should only be one Shared Data Fetcher per Object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that the Apex class implements RecordsFlags.SharedData and is used for returning data shared by other Fetcher classes. There should only be one Shared Data Fetcher per Object.
CustomField.label: Is Shared Data Fetcher?
